description.narrative: The project will improve urban infrastructure facilities and the environment in the cities of Kelamayi and Kuitun in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region (XUAR), which will contribute to sustainable economic growth and improve the quality of life for about 340,000 urban residents in the two project cities.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved urban management and services, including upgraded water, roads, and flood control in the project cities

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Running time of urban public transport and residents travel time shortened by 50% in Kelamayi

description.narrative: Improved urban management and services, including upgraded water, roads, and flood control in the project cities

title.narrative: Safe wastewater reuse rate in Kelamayi increased from 0% to 50%

description.narrative: Improved urban management and services, including upgraded water, roads, and flood control in the project cities

title.narrative: By 2020 (baseline 2011) Annual probability of seasonal flooding in Kuitun reduced from 10% to 2%

description.narrative: Improved urban management and services, including upgraded water, roads, and flood control in the project cities

title.narrative: NRW not to exceed: (i) 6% in Kelamayi (ii) 12% in Kuitun

description.narrative: Improved urban management and services, including upgraded water, roads, and flood control in the project cities

title.narrative: Overall efficiency of water usage to be improved from: (i) 70% to 90% in Kuitun (ii) 90% to 94% in Kelamayi

description.narrative: Improved urban management and services, including upgraded water, roads, and flood control in the project cities

title.narrative: Urban green area increased from: (i) 38.87% to 40% Kelamayi (ii) 35.2% to 38% Kuitun

description.narrative: Improved urban management and services, including upgraded water, roads, and flood control in the project cities
